ideas.title: Equity’s 2026 Predictions: AI Agents, Blockbuster IPOs, and the Future of VC
ideas.description: TechCrunch’s Equity crew is bringing 2025 to a close and getting ahead on the year to come with our annual predictions episode! Hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan were joined by Build Mode host Isabelle Johannessen to dissect the year’s biggest tech developments, from mega AI funding rounds that defied expectations to the rise of “physical AI,” and make […]
hooks: Master 2026's Tech Predictions: Your AI Roadmap
AI's Next Frontier: 2026 Insider Secrets Revealed

tips: Use annotated timeline graphics for prediction milestones
Include clickable chapter markers for each prediction
Create dynamic screen overlays showing data/trend visualizations

visualDirection.description: Futuristic cyberpunk color palette (deep blues, electric teals, neon accents). Dynamic motion graphics with holographic data visualizations. Sharp, geometric sans-serif typography. Minimal but high-tech composition with layered information panels. Animated predictive trend lines and AI-inspired visual metaphors.

exampleOutline: Introduction: Why 2026 Tech Predictions Matter
Context: Current AI and VC Landscape
Step-by-Step Prediction Methodology
5 Detailed Tech Predictions with Evidence
Strategic Takeaways and Future Implications

ideas.title: Nvidia to license AI chip challenger Groq’s tech and hire its CEO
ideas.description: With Groq on its side, Nvidia is poised to become even more dominant in chip manufacturing.
hooks: Nvidia's Billion-Dollar Chess Move in AI Chips
How Groq Just Reshaped the AI Hardware Landscape
Inside the Tech Merger Changing Everything

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of chip architecture
Create chapter markers for complex technical segments

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-inspired color palette (deep blues, electric teals), geometric motion graphics simulating circuit board animations, futuristic sans-serif typography with technical wireframe overlays, dynamic split-screen transitions showcasing chip comparisons

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic reveal of Nvidia-Groq partnership
Context: Current AI chip manufacturing landscape
Technical Deep Dive: What makes Groq's technology unique
Strategic Implications: Future of AI hardware
Closing CTA: Invite viewers to discuss implications

ideas.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
ideas.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.
hooks: Data Centers: The Hidden Powerhouses Reshaping Our World
When Tech Infrastructure Became the New Rockstars
Behind the Servers: A Tech Revolution Unfolds

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of massive data center facilities
Incorporate dynamic motion graphics explaining complex infrastructure
Include expert interview snippets for credibility and narrative depth

visualDirection.description: Cool tech-noir aesthetic with deep blue and silver color palette, high-contrast typography, dynamic camera movements simulating data flow, architectural cinematography highlighting data center scale, subtle glitch/digital overlay effects, clean but bold graphic transitions

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic aerial shot of massive data center campus
Context: The invisible infrastructure powering global technology
Transformation: How AI and cloud computing changed data centers
Impact: Economic and technological implications of infrastructure evolution
Future Outlook: Predictions and emerging trends in data center technology
